targets.rawSql: select * from myskool.Holidays
select * from Campus where id = $campusId

SELECT COUNT(id),userType  FROM User 
where campusId=$campusId 
GROUP BY userType

panels.description: Displaying selected session for the organization

targets.rawSql:
SELECT sess.session FROM Institute  inst
left join Sessions sess ON sess.id = inst.sessionId

panels.title: Current Session

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MYAALInvoices where feeStatus NOT IN ('Paid','Cancelled');
SELECT SUM(AMOUNT) FROM MYAALInvoices where feeStatus IN ('Unpaid','Partial');

panels.description: Total income today, constitutes fee payment, pre payment, inventory sell etc

targets.rawSql: select SUM(AMOUNT) FROM Transactions where transactionType='Credit' and DATE(created_at) = CURDATE()

panels.title: Income Today

panels.description: Sum of all debits including Salary Payment, Purchases etc

targets.rawSql: select IFNULL(SUM(AMOUNT),0) FROM Transactions where transactionType='Debit' and DATE(created_at) = CURDATE()

panels.title: Expense Today

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    (select IFNULL(SUM(AMOUNT),0) FROM Transactions where transactionType='Credit' and DATE(created_at) = CURDATE())
  - (select IFNULL(SUM(AMOUNT),0) FROM Transactions where transactionType='Debit' and DATE(created_at) = CURDATE()) AS Difference

select IFNULL(SUM(AMOUNT),0) FROM Transactions where transactionType='Debit' and MONTH(created_at) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE())
AND YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())

select SUM(AMOUNT) FROM Transactions where transactionType='Credit' and MONTH(created_at) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE())
AND YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())

panels.description: Difference of Income & Expense for this month

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    (select IFNULL(SUM(AMOUNT),0) FROM Transactions where transactionType='Credit' and MONTH(created_at) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE())
AND YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()))
  - (select IFNULL(SUM(AMOUNT),0) FROM Transactions where transactionType='Debit' and MONTH(created_at) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE())
AND YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())) AS Difference

panels.title: Profit this month

panels.description: Total income this year, constitutes fee payment, pre payment, inventory sell etc

targets.rawSql: select SUM(AMOUNT) FROM Transactions where transactionType='Credit' and YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())

panels.title: Income this Year

panels.description: Sum of all debits including Salary Payment, Purchases etc

targets.rawSql: select IFNULL(SUM(AMOUNT),0) FROM Transactions where transactionType='Debit' and YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())

panels.title: Expense this Year

panels.description: Difference of Income & Expense for this year

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    (select IFNULL(SUM(AMOUNT),0) FROM Transactions where transactionType='Credit' AND YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()))
  - (select IFNULL(SUM(AMOUNT),0) FROM Transactions where transactionType='Debit' AND YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())) AS Difference

panels.title: Profit this Year

targets.rawSql:
select SUM(amount), LAG(SUM(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY MONTH(created_at)) AS previous_value,
MONTH(created_at) from myskool.Transactions where transactionType='Debit'
AND YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) 
AND campusId=$campusId 
group by MONTH(created_at)  
order by MONTH(created_at)  desc
LIMIT 1;

select SUM(amount), LAG(SUM(amount)) OVER (ORDER BY MONTH(created_at)) AS previous_value,
MONTH(created_at) from myskool.Transactions where transactionType='Credit'
AND YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) 
AND campusId=$campusId 
group by MONTH(created_at)  
order by MONTH(created_at)  desc
LIMIT 1;

SELECT invoiceNumber as 'Invoice#',paidOn as 'Paid On',paymentType as 'Paid In',dueDate as 'Due on',amount as 'Amount' FROM MYAALInvoices
where feeStatus IN ('Paid','Partial')
AND campusId=$campusId 
order by paidOn desc LIMIT 3;

SELECT amount as 'Amount', usr.displayName as 'Student',cls.className as 'Class', sec.sectionName as 'Section', invoiceNumber as 'Invoice#',
dueDate as 'Due on'FROM myskool.MYAALInvoices inv
LEFT JOIN myskool.Class cls ON cls.id=inv.classId
LEFT JOIN myskool.Section sec ON sec.id=inv.sectionId
LEFT JOIN myskool.User usr ON usr.id=inv.userId
where inv.feeStatus IN ('Unpaid','Partial')
AND inv.campusId=$campusId AND inv.dueDate<curdate()
order by inv.paidOn LIMIT 3;

SELECT invoiceNumber as 'Invoice#',dueDate as 'Due on',amount as 'Amount' FROM myskool.MYAALInvoices
where feeStatus IN ('Unpaid','Partial')
AND campusId=$campusId 
order by paidOn LIMIT 3;

options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
select usr.displayName as 'Name',cls.className as 'Class', sec.sectionName as 'Section',usr.thumbnailUrl as'Photo'
,usr.admissionDate from myskool.User usr
LEFT JOIN myskool.Class cls ON cls.id=usr.classId
LEFT JOIN myskool.Section sec ON sec.id=usr.sectionId
where usr.userType='student' and usr.active=1
order by usr.admissionDate desc
Limit 3

panels.description: Hover on the bars to see the Class, Section and Count of pending fees

targets.rawSql:
SELECT MONTHNAME(inv.created_at),cls.className, sec.sectionName, SUM(AMOUNT), COUNT(*) FROM myskool.MYAALInvoices inv
LEFT JOIN myskool.Class cls ON cls.id = inv.classId
LEFT JOIN myskool.Section sec ON sec.id = inv.sectionId
where inv.feeStatus IN ('Unpaid', 'Partial') 
AND YEAR(inv.created_at) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) and inv.campusId = $campusId 
group by MONTHNAME(inv.created_at),cls.className, sec.sectionName;

panels.title: Month wise unpaid fees amount w/t count

targets.rawSql:
SELECT holi.name, holi.holidayStart, holi.holidayEnd,cls.className,sec.sectionName FROM Holidays holi
LEFT JOIN Class cls ON cls.id = holi.classId
LEFT JOIN Section sec ON sec.id = holi.sectionId
where holi.campusId=$campusId
